Space Shooter

Blast alien ships in this exciting arcade space shooter

Arcade Shooter Space Free to Play
Play Now

Play Space Shooter Online

Having trouble? Open game in a new tab

Game Features

Fast-Paced Action

Experience intense arcade shooting with rapid-fire weapons and explosive effects.

Multiple Spaceships

Choose from various spacecraft, each with different weapons and capabilities.

Power-Up System

Collect power-ups to enhance your weapons and defenses during gameplay.

How to Play

Controls

  • Arrow Keys Move your spaceship
  • Space Fire weapons
  • Z Special weapon

Gameplay Tips

  • Focus on destroying enemies with power-ups first
  • Save your special weapon for boss encounters
  • Don't stay in one place too long
  • Watch for patterns in enemy movements

About Space Shooter

Space Shooter is a classic arcade-style game where you control a powerful spaceship defending Earth from alien invaders. Your mission is to defeat waves of enemy ships while avoiding their attacks.

As you progress through the game, you'll encounter increasingly difficult enemies and powerful boss ships. Collect power-ups to upgrade your weapons and increase your chances of survival.

With simple controls and addictive gameplay, Space Shooter offers the perfect balance of challenge and fun for both casual and hardcore gamers.
